name: CoronaLOOP Post LD47
description:
Improved version of the original game made for Ludum Dare 47.

Post Jam version with these features:

  - Background added.
  - Contextual indicators for the cell moving direction.
  - Bug fixes.

INSTRUCTIONS:

 - Destroy all viruses before losing all your lymphocytes. 
- If a virus hits a cell, it creates another virus.
 - Lymphocytes can kill 2 viruses before dying.
 - Use ARROW keys to control the camera.
 - Use SPACEBAR to dodge cells.
 - Use ESCAPE to go back to the menu.
